chat_history.message:
Hello,

My iPhone 13 Pro has a problem:

Since the first of April, the phone's battery functioned strangely:
The durability was very short, despite the battery state showing 100%, I had to put my phone on charge at least twice a day. 
Currently, I leave the house in the morning with a 100% battery and by lunchtime, it's already gone (with completely normal usage). 
Additionally, the durability is unstable, it can go from 60% to 57% in just one second, for example. 
Furthermore, note that the battery capacity has decreased from 100% to 91% in just two months, and it gets worse every time.

Thanks,

Dear Backcare,

Unfortunately, our repair team is unable to fix the issue and we have insufficient stock for exchange. Instead, we have processed the full refund. Thank you for your understanding.

Regards,
JY
